attributes.action: Change the law for dog on dog attacks
attributes.background:
My dog was attacked on our door step when we were leaving for a walk she lost a part of her ear received puncher wounds to her neck and required emergency surgery.
The dog warden Visited the owner but because  I was not injured in the attack there was no investigation by the law.

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about what happened to your dog. 

Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you'd like changes to the law, but we aren't sure exactly what changes you'd like. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/258477
